sent.orig: You are an individual and managing your investments is individual too.
sent.trans: 您是一位个人，您的投资管理也应该是独特的。

sent.orig: The specific use of leisure varies from individual to individual.
sent.trans: 休闲的具体用途因人而异。

sent.orig: Collective solutions to problems start with individual human beings and individual efforts.
sent.trans: 整体的解决方法始于单一个体的个别努力。

sent.orig: And that was the last individual individual ever seen.
sent.trans: 那是最后一次看到个体金蟾的出现。

sent.orig: Family educationally a foundation of an individual growth and It'standardizes the orientation of individual development.
sent.trans: 家庭教育奠定个体发展的基础，同时也规范着个体的发展方向。
